title: Background a Political Candidate
description: A political reporter is assigned to cover a new candidate running for office and must research their entire public history.

tasks.description: Search for the candidate's voting record, past held offices, and any previous campaign platforms.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent compiles a complete political history.

tasks.description: Investigate their business and financial history, looking for potential conflicts of interest.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent retrieves financial disclosure forms and business records.

tasks.description: Search for any past legal issues, including lawsuits or criminal charges.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent performs a thorough search of court records.
